name: Pyramid Rampage
description:
You control rock jonas, a famous archaeologist who found the pyramid that contains an ancient treasure of a pharaoh, Jonas left in search of this treasure.
While catching the treasure, he activated an ancient trap made by Pharaoh, he now needs to escape the pyramid before he runs out of space.

How to Play:

WASD - Move

Espace - Jump

J - Shoot

K- roll

Sprites & arts: Vinicius S Rocha

Programmer: Kaue Silva

Musics : Lucas Davi
